item.title: Race of Life 生命竞赛
item.description:
Race of Life [Act 2 Ep.4] [Underground Studio]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 《Race of Life》是一部成人视觉小说。你扮演杰克·米勒（Jake Miller），一位离婚的教授，他因过去的错误失去了高薪工作和婚姻，开始从事教学工作。当悲剧降临时，杰克必须运用他的所有技能、智慧和冷酷无情来拯救他最爱的人。

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Act 1 - 1.04.5
  • 发行日期：2025-04-10

Changelog

更新日志
  • We’ve just fixed an issue that was affecting access to saves made before the last hotfix. The good news is: your pre-update saves SHOULD now work again! If we didn’t f*ck something up in the process, that is.
  • However, we also want to be honest with you — this fix may have caused some saves made after April 10th (in specific scenes) to no longer function correctly. We’re really sorry about that.
  • Over the past few days, we’ve been working hard to understand and solve this issue. Unfortunately, it was something out of our control — it’s a rare problem that can occur with the engine we use to build the game. This was our first time encountering it too.
  • We truly hope this won’t happen in future updates, but we can’t promise it won’t — though we’ll do everything we can to prevent it.
  • Also, good news: we might have fixed the issue where the walkthrough wasn’t launching properly. If you had trouble with that before, please give it another try after this update and let us know if it works for you!
  • We’re really sorry for the inconvenience, and we hope those of you who started new saves recently will understand the situation. If you need to replay the game from the beginning, take use of the skip function. You can also turn on “Skip the unseen” option in settings - it’ll speed up the process even more.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Steam
  • Discord
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

PS
  • 感觉挺ok的。

Win/Linux（PC端）

  • 官中原版：GOFILE
  • 官中原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁：GOFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁：VIKINGFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版和AI意译汉化补丁
  • 解压英文原版压缩包文件
  • 将汉化补丁rpa文件放入game文件夹中
  • 启动exe游戏，选择简体中文即可

  1. 下载链接：
  • 官中原版：GOFILE
  • 官中原版：VIKINGFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁：GOFILE
  • AI意译汉化补丁：VIKINGFILE
  • 主体APK：GOFILE
  • 主体APK：VIKINGFILE
  1. 安装步骤：
  • 下载英文原版、AI意译汉化补丁和主体APK
  • 安装APK文件
  • 启动游戏，放行所有权限
  • 这时游戏会闪退，如果没有闪退，就自己手动大退
  • 然后解压英文原版压缩包文件
  • 将英文原版game文件夹中的所有文件及文件夹和汉化补丁rpa文件一起移动到以下路径： 
    1

    Documents/RenPy_Saves/com.luoqian.RaceofLife/game
  • 最后启动游戏，选择简体中文即可

item.title: FreshWomen 新生也疯狂
item.description:
FreshWomen [Chloe’s: Desire Express DLC] [OppaiMan]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 《新生也疯狂》是一款由选择推动情节发展的成人向视觉小说游戏，聚焦于生活中最美好的点点滴滴。成为密涅瓦湾学院的新生，和美少女们谈情说爱，揭开事故的谜团。您的这趟旅程将充满欢笑和坎坷，以及海量的性爱内容。

item.title: Getting Intimate 亲密无间
item.description:
Getting Intimate [Ch.2 Part C] [MangoWorks]

Overview

剧情概要
  • A young man makes efforts to get into college and fulfill the promise he made many years ago. However, in the same year as the entrance exam, a sudden and tragic event leads him down a different path. Four years later, having lost everything, he receives the opportunity to rebuild his life. In this familiar yet new place, he will meet different people who will have an impact on his life while more than one secret awaits to be revealed.​

item.title: House of Hearts 红心之屋
item.description:
House of Hearts [Ep.2 P.1] [SparkHG]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The next successor war dawns on Earth. A seat at the high table, once governed by a powerful demon, went vacant for unknown reasons. With a chance at a position of control, other lesser demons roused from their respective places, each with an aspiration of reaching the apex of power
Spoiler
  • But you, an outsider, knew nothing about it. A rude awakening haunted your place in the form of an armed assailant, and you’d be dead if it wasn’t due to a man who called himself your father.
  • Thrown into a different life, you must gather power from gaining loyal followers;
  • (mainly)women beguiled by your irresistible demonic charm. Seduce and corrupt your way into a stable life.
  • And then… maybe, just maybe, you might rise to the top.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio

item.title: Shattered Minds 破碎的心灵
item.description:
Shattered Minds [v0.24 Beta] [eXtasy Games]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Shattered Minds is an open-world game, in which you take control over the life of a college student.
  • Your normal life is thrown out of whack after you realize you have the power to control the minds of others.
  • You will use this power to make all your dreams, desires and wishes come true!
  • A world with countless quests, figures, plots and locations are waiting to be discovered and controlled by you!
  • Shattered Minds includes plenty of animations, a licensed soundtrack and atmospheric sound effects!
  • Be ready to experience a game full of sexy adventures!
  • All paired with a thrilling, mysterious yet humorous plot.

item.title: Summer Crush 夏日恋情
item.description:
Summer Crush [Ep.8 v1.0.3] [Wet n’ Juicy Games]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 《夏日恋情》是一部面向成年人的视觉小说。故事情节将完全取决于你做出的选择。你将扮演一个青年，一个已经计划好他的乏味成年生活的青年。现在，他正在等待夏天的结尾。可能会出现什么转机呢？

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Episode 8 - 1.03
  • 发行日期：2026-02-07

Changelog

更新日志
  • The eighth and final episode of Summer Crush is now available. New scenes, animations, achievements, and music await you. Well, business as usual!
  • I realize I’ve been dragging my feet. In May 2025, when I sat down to develop the final episode, I thought I’d have it all finished in time for the game’s third anniversary, November 25th. And now, on November 24th, I’m looking at the game’s progress and realizing there’s still a ton of work to do: the animations aren’t ready, some renders aren’t finished, the music is missing, and there’s no sign of any translations into other languages. This post is partly for myself – if you’re the only one responsible for everything, don’t set deadlines! You’ll never make it…
  • Nevertheless, I apologize. The game was supposed to be finished sooner, but I couldn’t do it before. But now it’s done!
  • I hope you enjoy it. Thank you for devoting your precious time to my little game.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Steam
  • Discord

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 还行，水友推荐的。

item.title: Ms.Denvers 丹弗斯女士（毕加索女士）
item.description:
Ms.Denvers [v0.1.2.4] [Pop Toc]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Wanda Denvers is a 40-year-old single mother with a son and two daughters. She’s the principal of Middleton High School. This story focuses on her life after 5 years of divorce, as she battles with the task of having to take care of 3 people on her own. It’s now been so long since she had a love life she feels more lonely than ever before. How will she fill the pit of emptiness in her life? You decide.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.1.2.4
  • 发行日期：2026-01-31

Changelog

更新日志
  • N/A

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Subscribestar
  • Discord
  • Boosty
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
  • Itch.io

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 天天挤压膏，而且放那么好的建模，就是死活不上垒，跟心之困扰一个屌样，真不如改名毕加索女士得了。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-02-10
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Boundaries of Morality 道德的边界
item.description:
Boundaries of Morality [v0.68.0a] [Novel]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Get ready for an exhilarating experience where every choice you make can either pave the way to success or drag your life into a spiral of intrigues and manipulations.
  • At the heart of the story is Emma, a young woman embarking on a new job in a major company. But she quickly realizes that the office walls hide not just career opportunities but also a tangled web of schemes and secrets she must skillfully navigate.
Spoiler
  • Your mission is to help Emma traverse this labyrinth of tough decisions. Lies, temptations, manipulations — or loyalty, honesty, and purity — the path you choose leads to unique outcomes. Boldness or caution? Ambition or moral principles? It’s up to you to shape her career and personal life.
  • Immerse yourself in a world where the choice between morality and ambition becomes a test of strength. “Boundaries of Morality” is a story where every decision matters. Your task is to find balance between career and personal relationships—whether by staying true to yourself or completely transforming. Are you ready to face the challenges of destiny and emerge victorious?

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.68.0a
  • 发行日期：2026-02-07

Changelog

更新日志
  • Art & Assets +397
  • Video Content 496 (+134)
  • Word Count 99,497 (+18,027)
  • Major Updates
    • Continuation of the event with Victor.
    • Continuation of the event with Victor, including the refusal path. All endings converge to a single plot point, using my favorite technique a cliffhanger.
    • 3 events with Liliana (Done).
    • Bonus event with the Masseur/Painter. (Done)
    • Roleplay event: Emma and Tyler. (Done)
    • Sophie’s Revenge. (Done)
  • Minor Updates
    • Texting with Justin after the bar.
    • Condition: Day 14.
    • Tyler’s reaction to the flowers (if Emma accepted them).
      • Condition: Being in the living room with Tyler on that day or the next (approx. Day 7).
    • Jill’s reaction to the promotion.
      • Trigger: Automatically on the next day.
    • Small events with Liliana and Tyler in the office.
      • Condition: As you progress through her storyline, they will automatically appear in the office. These events do - not advance the plot; they simply make the world feel a bit more alive and rich.
    • Small events with Emma in the office and at home.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Discord

PS
  • 还行，f95评分很高，但是CG是ai制作的，也有官中，不过是ai的，但是质量还挺高，总比没有好，不然又得跑ai了。

item.title: Game of Hearts 红心游戏
item.description:
Game of Hearts [Ch.5 R2] [SparkHG]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The next successor war dawns on Earth. A seat at the high table, once governed by a powerful demon, went vacant for unknown reasons. With a chance at a position of control, other lesser demons roused from their respective places, each with an aspiration of reaching the apex of power
Spoiler
  • But you, an outsider, knew nothing about it. A rude awakening haunted your place in the form of an armed assailant, and you’d be dead if it wasn’t due to a man who called himself your father.
  • Thrown into a different life, you must gather power from gaining loyal followers;
  • (mainly)women beguiled by your irresistible demonic charm. Seduce and corrupt your way into a stable life.
  • And then… maybe, just maybe, you might rise to the top.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Ch.5 R2
  • 发行日期：2025-03-21

Changelog

更新日志
  • Grammar and spelling fix mod, courtesy of sac812(official). The file is named: GameOfHearts_EditedScript_Ch5Pt2_Public.zip
  • As per usual, if you used modded saves and scripts, the mods will have to be adapted to the public release before your saves can be used again. Please consult the mod author for an update before proceeding.
  • Developer Notes updated. Please read it if you want to know about the sequel.

item.title: Desert Stalker 沙漠追猎者
item.description:
Desert Stalker [v0.20.0 Beta] [Zetan]

Overview

游戏概述
  • Desert Stalker puts you in control of a seasoned antiquity scavenger, a man whose main objective is finding rare objects in the ruins of civilization. When you uncover an artifact capable of not only informing the past but also shaping the future, everything changes. Make major decisions about how you interact with the world around you, enter into erotic relationships, and live with the consequences of either dominating or saving both the people and landscape of post-apocalyptic Egypt.​

item.description:

Overview

  • Being a game developer is no easy task, but finally,your game is ready to be released, and you’ll soon be able to…Oh no, an unfortunate accident has occurred.You are trapped inside a game – YOUR game.And after a closer look… Yes, it’s different, but why?Set out to uncover why, how, and who modified your game, and above all,how to escape from it…​

Since the death of their Queen and a great apathy seized their king, it fell to Atlas, the prince of the vampires, to restore order. So when he smells an unfamiliar scent that should not have been amongst a party of humans, he goes to investigate and meets Leyala.

PS
  • 个人感觉这游戏比新生也疯狂好玩，无论是建模还是剧情，仅次于我的大学生活，但是就更新有点慢，本来是要等作者更新，再出这个游戏的汉化的，可惜一眼望不到头，行吧，这游戏代码逻辑…怎么说呢？有点反人类，作者是舒服了，我去找文本源码可就惨咯，难怪这游戏没人搞…
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-02-16
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Heart Problems 心之困扰
item.description:
Heart Problems [v0.10] [Xenorav]

Overview

剧情概要
  • In HeartProblems you play as a guy who, after losing his parents, moves in with his uncle Davie. As the years pass and he reaches sexual maturity, he begins to realize that he lives with three incredibly beautiful women…​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：v0.10
  • 发行日期：2025-07-29

Changelog

更新日志
  • New chapter added: Chapter 10.
  • Gallery updated with all new scenes from Chapter 10. - Unlock button included
  • Improved visual quality in the compressed version. After testing, the best resolution for image quality vs file size is 1286x724.
  • New visual filters added. You can now adjust saturation, brightness, contrast, and tint (cooler/bluer or warmer/orange tones) from - the Preferences menu.
  • New “Auto” speed option available in Chapter 10 animations. (Plays animations at randomized intervals for a more natural effect.)
  • Image transitions can no longer be skipped by spamming clicks. (You can still use Ctrl to skip normally.)
  • Fixed a bug that caused animations to play too fast on monitors with high refresh rates. (Currently fixed for Chapter 10 - animations—coming to the rest soon.)
  • New memory usage options added to improve performance:Low ≈ 2GB RAMMedium ≈ 4GB RAMHigh ≈ 6GB RAM (This helps to store more images in - ram to avoid lag in transitions and between animation transitions.)
  • New role system for Amelie. For example, if you set her role as “mom” a line like “Hi [relation] Amelie” will appear as just “Hi, - Amelie.” If you chose “Aunt,” it would show “Hi, Aunt Amelie”.
  • New “Default” option added in settings-audio, which resets all audio levels to the developer’s recommended values.
  • The Android version now finally has a custom app icon (no more default Ren’Py icon).

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon

落谦酱便利贴

PS
  • 心之困扰，网上流传是叫情感问题，心脏问题，为什么落谦这里是心之困扰，其实这部作品就是围绕姨妈的展开，作者一直不上垒，其实也正常，毕竟姨妈是有夫之妇。
  • 如果跟自己的侄子发生关系…但是已经是两个孩子的母亲，大的女儿已经有自己的一半岁数了，也到了绝经的年龄，也打上人老珠黄buff，导致姨妈和姨父感情不合，男主作为第三者，也就是boyfriend？目前关系还没崩。
  • 这部小说最大的卖点就是姨妈，姨妈一上垒就可以完结，就可以弃坑了，当然，作者肯定不会，至少要拖个一两年，我本来是想等更新新版本再写博文，但是迟迟不更，去年8月跑完ai就一直躺着，索性就上传一下吧。
关于汉化补丁
  • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦

item.title: A Mother's Love 母亲的爱
item.description:
A Mother’s Love [Part 1-16 Plus] [OrbOrigin]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Your girlfriend’s mother doesn’t like you - doesn’t appreciate you for anything. Most of all, she wants you to leave her daughter because you’re in the way of her education. Little did she know, you have an affection for the mother and as she grows desperate to get rid of you, You both settle down of an agreement. An agreement that could change your whole relationship.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • Fix the bug with calling Nicole by her real name
  • Edit the walkthrough regarding calling Nicole by her real name
  • Splash screen has been updated with a new Motherly-Care Tier name list.
  • The Chapter Selection has been updated with Part 16.

item.title: The Office 办公室潜规则
item.description:
The Office [Episode 4 v0.1 Beta Fixed] [Damaged Coda]

Overview

剧情概要
  • This game is about Gail, a 27-year-old woman working in a financial services company called HI&F - Huge Investment and Finances. She is a street-smart lady who came from humble beginnings. She started as a receptionist after years of hard work and some harmless flirting. (So she thought.) After winning the fight against a colleague for her dream job. Gail gets promoted to the Regional Sales Manager position. That was the easy part, with potential enemies around every corner planning her downfall. What will she do to thrive and survive to reach her ultimate goal as CEO of HI&F?​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说

item.title: Echoes of 2990 2990的回声
item.description:
Echoes of 2990 [Ch.2 0.2.3] [AADev]

Overview

剧情概要
  • The year is 2990. You’re a rebellious punk fresh out of high school — all defiance and devil-may-care charm — until one punch changes everything. It was supposed to be just another fight, another middle finger to the system. But your opponent? Your teacher. His fist didnât just knock you down — it knocked something loose. Now you’re seeing flashes of the future. This isn’t a gift. It’s a glitch in reality. And it’s your ticket onto a high-stakes deep-space mission, alongside a crew of sassy, seductive women.
  • Destination: Andromeda
  • Mission: Forge a new world, connect with alien civilizations, and carve your legacy — as a king, a conqueror… or the heart of a harem. The story is yours to shape.​

item.description:

Overview

剧情概要
  • Sunville的MILFs是一款成人游戏，讲述一个年轻人被迫离开大城市的奢华生活，回到小镇Sunville的大学。这是一款VN沙盒游戏，充满了美丽的女孩、浪漫、道德选择、优质的图形和炙热的动画。

游戏信息

剧情概要
  • Bright Lord is an adult, erotic horror game in which you become Bright Lord’s servant. Will you let him take over your mind completely or fight his will in his conquest for power and revenge?
Spoiler
  • Story Follow the story of a man whose life is changed forever when he meets a paranormal demon. Which uses your body to fight his battles. You try to resist his will, but the more you try, it just makes you get more and more corrupted. It gets to the point where you have to use the demon’s help to do the right thing.   • AI模型：DeepSeek-V3
  • 翻译作者：落谦
  • 制作日期：2026-01-10
  • PS：可能会出现极少量的人名翻译误差。例如我指定AI将Rachel统一翻译为瑞秋，AI只会在检测到完全一致的英文单词时进行替换。如果原文中存在拼写错误、缩写格式，或Rachel’s这类词形变化（如名词的所有格、复数用法等），就可能被误译成瑞穗，但仍会保持音译形式，总之不妨碍游玩，如果介意，还请勿玩。
  • 免死金牌： 落谦的汉化补丁，无论是 AI 意译版本还是逐句意译版本，都远不及原文或其他大佬的汉化版本。与其他汉化大佬不同，落谦并非为了为爱发电，而是纯粹希望提升文笔，所以会加入更多文化色彩，比如网络热梗？古诗词？谚语？俗语？网文小说梗？等等？还请高抬贵手，别再阴阳怪气我了。

item.title: Breeze of Passion 激情之风
item.description:
Breeze of Passion [v9.01 Extra] [L7team]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 《Breeze of Passion》是一款成人游戏。你扮演一名年轻小伙，搬到海边小镇，协助复兴一家酒店。这部视觉小说满是漂亮女孩、火辣 MILF 和意想不到的剧情反转，并配有高质量画面与劲爆动画。

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：沙盒视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：9.01 Extra
  • 发行日期：2025-05-14

Changelog

更新日志
  • Hey there, everyone!
  • We are overjoyed to finally be able to present you with the new big expansion for Breeze of Passion — Deep Inspection!
  • This is not just another game update, but a standalone story sequel with a huge amount of content!
  • We worked very hard to make it special and give you the opportunity to be with your favorite characters again in the vortex of events that awaits you!
  • When it comes to this expansion, we definitely didn’t waste time.
  • It features about 5300(!!!) new images and tons and tons of animations, including full-length mocap pole dances of various girls.
  • We’ve gotten access to XSens motion capture equipment, including StretchSense Studio Pro gloves. We are currently experimenting with it and trying to figure out how it can improve the quality of our games.
  • If you didn’t already know, half of our team consists of girls. Which means they take part in creating many of the scenes you see in the game. Also, a lot of mocap animations in this update were made by the same girls
  • At the same time, we can proudly say that we do not use AI in our creative process. For example, the OST, among many other things, was licensed from real composers.
  • Absolutely everything you see in the world created by L7team is produced by living and breathing people, who love their craft and try very hard to make sure you have a lot of fun with the game!
  • Next on the menu is the final update of MILFs of Sunville.
  • We are already starting to work on it.
  • But don’t you worry. Just like with Breeze of Passion, you can look forward to more unforgettable and amazing content to be added for that game, even after that.
  • By supporting us, you help preserve the community of people who share your passions and work hard to make you a little happier ❤
  • Enjoy the Game!

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Steam
  • Discord

item.title: My Bimbo Dream 我的金发女郎之梦
item.description:
My Bimbo Dream [S2 v2.0.6] [MBD]

Overview

剧情概要
  • 一款围绕碧池化、堕落与扭曲恋情的重口味视觉小说。引导你那甜美的“房东”苏，踏上转变之路。可选择的路线包括：后宫、皮条客、或可选NTR。

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：Season 2 - 2.0.6
  • 发行日期：2025-12-26

Changelog

更新日志
  • ~25,000 words
  • 780 new images
  • 16 hand-crafted animations
  • 11 mini animations
  • Core Changes & Improvements
  • We’ve introduced new underlying coding to better track the status of each girl throughout the game. This allows us to handle relationships, routes, and consequences more cleanly and consistently going forward.
  • Important:
  • Because of these changes, old save files will not be compatible.
  • Please start a new game, then use Episode Select to return to the point you were at.
  • Quality of Life & Systems
  • Gameplay guide added at the start of a new game.
  • Skip all sharing option added for players who want a more controlled experience.
  • Selected names and relationship choices now persist between playthroughs.
  • These can be reset at any time in the Preferences menu.
  • Simplified episode skip recap for faster catch-up.
  • If the game encounters missing variables, it will now prompt you to select the missing option instead of breaking.
  • This also makes saves more reliable going forward.
  • New “Modify Variables” option added to the Preferences menu.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Steam
  • Discord
  • Subscribestar

item.title: The Better Deal 更好的交易
item.description:
The Better Deal [v0.8b] [Ze-gam-eZ]

Overview

剧情概要
  • A story-focused, highly animated visual novel with several love interests, both male and female.

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

版本信息

  • 当前版本：0.8b
  • 发行日期：2025-12-18

Changelog

更新日志
  • The update contains some bug fixes, fixed typos and translations.
  • This update covers Chapter 3 — the climax of the story. While the earlier parts of the game focused on determining the main heroine’s love interest, here you’ll be making choices between life and death. And of course, all your previous decisions still have a major impact on how the story unfolds.
  • The update adds 1,657 images, 34 animations, 5 music tracks, and 34 sound effects. In terms of content volume, it’s roughly equal to the very first release of the game (the one on Steam). However, because the story branches extensively, each individual path won’t be very long — which I hope is clear.
  • This update includes all the bad endings. If you manage to complete this chapter, everything ahead will be only good endings, plus one or two “gray” ones.

Developer（入正地址）

  • Patreon
  • Itch.io
  • Steam
  • Subscribestar

item.title: Color of My Sound 我声音的颜色
item.description:
Color of My Sound [Ch.4a] [Gallant Trombe]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Color of My Sound is a Sci-Fi Thriller and Erotic visual novel.
  • The story began when a rebellion erupted across the Empire’s worlds on an unprecedented scale and humanity faced an uncertain future for the first time since the Empire’s inception.
  • Follow the story of the Officer, as he carefully manoeuvres around the machinations of various powers of the Empire, each vying for his allegiance or death…
  • As the commanding officer of Special Operations Squad “Nu”, form camaraderie, rivalry, and even romance with your team members. Careful, each member has their own hidden agenda and personal stake. Pay careful attention, trust no one. You will need to earn the loyalty, perhaps even the love of each member to survive…​

item.title: Fog of War 战争迷雾
item.description:
Fog of War [v0.5.1] [Story Machine Studios]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Rex Richards, born with an enhanced eidetic memory and a natural born soldier becomes the youngest to ever make Delta Force. Aka “The Unit”. After feeling like he is losing his humanity on the battlefield he retires. Rex uses his sciences degree he obtained while serving to attend R. Winters Medical University, where he tries to escape his clandestine operator past. Will Rex find solace on his new chosen path or become the monster he fears? Sometimes walking away does not mean you escape without a fight.​

游戏信息

游戏类型

  • 游戏玩法：视觉小说
  • 建模引擎：Daz Studio
  • 运行引擎：Ren’Py
  • 游戏画风：欧美风

item.title: Steps of Debauchery 堕落之路
item.description:
Steps of Debauchery [Ep.5.0-patreon] [Fooxied]

Overview

剧情概要
  • Follow the steps of Riley, a girl who moves from a small town to the city to help her husband, Mike, pursue his dreams. While Mike is busy with his bar, Riley supports him wholeheartedly and often puts others’ well-being above her own. This leads her into unexpected situations, where she discovers more about her true self and deepest desires.
  • She explores her sexuality in college and unravels her fantasies, takes on the role of a waitress at the bar, engages in activities with an elderly neighbor, streams adventures with his grandson and that’s just the tip of the mountain. Riley’s world is opening wide in front of her, and she waits for you to explore it.

游戏信息

Changelog

更新日志
  • Join your beloved and charming heroine, Riley, on an epic tale of magic, love, and cookies. Meet your wonderful cast clad in new look, new themes, and new situations. Things will be fun, exciting, and of course… steamy.
  • With Mike’s sudden disappearance, Riley finds herself looking for answers in the ever-enchanting Christmas dreamscape. Join her on a very merry adventure!
